chunk:
The Inkey List, Squalane

Brand: The Inkey List

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: 100% Squalane

Directions: Can be used AM and PM as preferred. Massage 1-2 drops into the skin after moisturizer or add 1-2 drops to your mositurizer. For more information on layering, watch the video in the layering section below.

Ingredient conc

ow.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
